name: Penumbra (Nicolás Oliver)
description:
Penumbra is a project created for the 2021 Global Game Jam.

Its a isometric third person shooter game, where you need to survive and endless (kind of) number of enemies where you need the right kind projectile to kill the targets.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Shoot: Left Click

Change Projectile:  Right Click (When you change the projectile, your cursor will change according to it. If you have the white  cursor you need to shoot the black targets and if you have the black cursor the white ones)

Programmer: Nicolás Oliver

3D Artists :  Andres Latorres & Nahuel Fontes

VFX Artist: Martin Arbe
